lead_paragraph: The Angels’ Jered Weaver, dealing with chronic neck pain, missed a spring training start, and the team did not know when he or the left-hander C. J. Wilson would resume throwing.
snippet: The Angels’ Jered Weaver, dealing with chronic neck pain, missed a spring training start, and the team did not know when he or the left-hander C. J. Wilson would resume throwing.
abstract: Los Angeles Angels pitcher Jered Weaver is diagnosed with degenerative spine condition; team is unsure whether he or C J Wilson will pitch again.
